abstract: Prosecution rests its case in involuntary manslaughter trial of Conrad Murray, Michael Jackson’s physician at the time of his death in 2009, after almost a month of testimony that provided a gloomy look at the pop star’s final days.
snippet: It is now the defense team’s turn to present its case in the involuntary manslaughter trial of Michael Jackson’s personal physician.
lead_paragraph: It is now the defense team’s turn to present its case in the involuntary manslaughter trial of Michael Jackson’s personal physician.

headline.main: Prosecution Rests in the Manslaughter Trial of Michael Jackson’s Physician
headline.print_headline: Prosecution Rests in the Manslaughter Trial of Michael Jackson’s Physician
headline.seo: Prosecution Rests in Trial of Conrad Murray, Jackson’s Doctor
